overview:
Ganesh Krishnan is the Director of Sales and Marketing at TriVium Systems, Inc., a leading provider of call recording and reporting solutions in the Accounts Receivables market. Ganesh has been with TriVium since 2005 and has assumed various sales, marketing and product management roles for the company. Ganesh holds a Masters in Computer Applications and an MBA in Marketing from India.

Prior to TriVium, Ganesh was with iCOPE Technologies, a telecom software service provider in the European and UK markets. He started as a software engineer with iCOPE technologies and morphed into a business development role with iCOPE before it was taken over by TriVium Systems, Inc. With over a decadeâ€™s experience in building and marketing telecom and voice technologies and products, Ganesh has developed an ability to translate business needs into successful products. He has very keenly followed the technologies and trends in the telecom domain for well over 15 years.
